blog.name: doctorstrangeaskblog
blog.title: Ask Doctor Strange
blog.description: Parody motivational fan made roleplay "ask blog" style for the fictional Marvel character Stephen Strange, the sassiest magician of the cosmos, NOT A DOCTOR. I DO NOT rp any innapropriate content with minors and I'll REPORT anyone I see doing so. No profit, just for fun, I'm not affiliated to Marvel or anyone, just fan made. Follow me on Twitter @drstrangefanask

Our link for our mobile nav is here.

summary: Welcome! A Hero’s Discord / to hell and back is a private Marvel RP group located on Discord. We are brand new and in search of...
caption:
Welcome! A Hero’s Discord / to hell and back is a private Marvel RP group located on Discord. We are brand new and in search of more members! We welcome all Marvel characters and all verses. Some facts about us: we are strictly 18+, do not accept doubles, do not accept OCs, and regularly schedule in-character events. We’re a bunch of fun-loving souls so send us a message if you have any questions!

Check our taken character list and send us an application! //// mobile nav.

blog.name: lyricfrost13
blog.title: Give Me a Happy Ending or So Help Me

summary: Hey So
body:
Hey So

I’m participating in the @winterironshieldbang this year and have made a grave error.

I came up with 2 AUs that I am very attached to, plus I wanna do art, but I know I’m going to murder myself over it as it’s my final year of college (uni, for some non-American followers)

SO what would you rather read people -

The Parent Trap AU I’ve already begun with 2 OC’s as the twins and Stuckony as the parents, which is obviously far more domestic even if it’s still basically set in the MCU/comic verse.

OR

a high fantasy setting I have not started with Dragon!Royalty!Tony, Knight!Steve, and Sorcerer!Bucky in which I will probably reference my current Medieval Literature/Tolkien class because my prof literally said “all literature is fanfic” the other day and I can get behind that

I want to do both but I don’t trust myself to finish them. Thoughts?

summary:
Bucky: I'm cold
Steve: Here take my jacket
Bucky: aww thanks babe
Peter: I'm cold too
Tony: What?! *takes off jacket* I fucking...
body:
Bucky: I’m cold

Steve: Here take my jacket

Bucky: aww thanks babe

Peter: I’m cold too

Tony: What?! *takes off jacket* I fucking told you to bring more fucking layers but of course you didn’t listen and now *piles scarves on Peter* I fucking have to make sure you don’t fucking FREEZE TO DEATH, but you’re allergic to sweaters, so what the fuck did I expect, and *takes somebody else’s hat* how fucking long have you been cold? You should’ve said something sooner.

summary: Life's Greatest Blessing
title: Life's Greatest Blessing
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2prgdBs

by Jessica_Wild

“That’s our fertile myrtle,” Clint jokes, smile creeping onto his face as he scoops up Harley to make place for Strange, “we can keep trying to keep the two of them away from each other, but I’m convinced that at this stage if Steve breathes a certain way, Tony’ll be knocked up with like, quintuplets or something.”

In which a slightly younger Tony and not-so-fresh-out-the-ice Steve are grossly in love and keep popping out babies and the Team actually IS a family.

Alternatively,

Family
Life’s greatest blessing, a group that dreams, laughs, plays and loves together, those whom you can always count on, always present not only in the good times, the most precious gifts.

Words: 1663, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Ant-Man (Movies), Captain Marvel (2019), Iron Man (Movies), Captain America (Movies)

  • Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), James “Bucky” Barnes, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Carol Danvers, Wong (Marvel), Stephen Strange, Scott Lang, Hope Van Dyne, Thor (Marvel), Jane Foster (Marvel), Logan (X-Men), Clint Barton, Peter Parker, Gwen Stacy, Nova, Sam Alexander, Harley Keener, Sam Wilson (Marvel)
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Stephen Strange/Wong (Marvel), James “Bucky” Barnes/Natasha Romanov, Carol Danvers/James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Scott Lang/Hope Van Dyne, Jane Foster/Thor

tags: as in: tumblr please understand that human emotions go beyond black and white moral systems
summary: i get that we hate howard stark but we shouldn't be so quick to dismiss the idea of tony making peace with his feelings about...
body: i get that we hate howard stark but we shouldn’t be so quick to dismiss the idea of tony making peace with his feelings about his abusive father, who he just found out didn’t actually kill his mother, to be able to be a father himself without using howard as a role model. relationships with abusive parents are complex and painful, and we shouldn’t be so quick to trash on a narrative about Tony making peace with the fact that his father probably shouldn’t have been a father in the first place, that he’s dead and he’s never coming back, and that reconciliation with the memory is probably the healthiest way for him to allow himself to be a good father for peter and morgan

reblog.comment: i get that we hate howard stark but we shouldn’t be so quick to dismiss the idea of tony making peace with his feelings about his abusive father, who he just found out didn’t actually kill his mother, to be able to be a father himself without using howard as a role model. relationships with abusive parents are complex and painful, and we shouldn’t be so quick to trash on a narrative about Tony making peace with the fact that his father probably shouldn’t have been a father in the first place, that he’s dead and he’s never coming back, and that reconciliation with the memory is probably the healthiest way for him to allow himself to be a good father for peter and morgan

summary: Pursuit of Happiness
title: Pursuit of Happiness
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NvOKNA

by zade

He codes. He fiddles with Extremis more than he should, like he told Pepper and Rhodey he wouldn’t. He wants to make things better, make them right. He wants to be happy again, somehow. They agreed he would take time off from business, though, give him and Pepper time to heal into whatever they’re going to be next. This is their cocoon stage; they might make it into a butterfly.

He realizes fiddling with how his brain can interact with information while he’s upset is maybe not the smartest thing, but he’s pretty sure a straight brain-wifi connection is still smarter than drinking himself into temporary amnesia. He’s a genius, after all, even if his self-preservation instincts wouldn’t be out of place on a lemming.
–
Tony uses extremis to try and make himself better. That is not what happens, at all.

Words: 8407, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe, Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, James “Bucky” Barnes, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Steve Rogers, Wanda Maximoff, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Pepper Potts, Clint Barton, Vision (Marvel), Friday (Marvel), Stark Robots (Marvel)
  • Relationships: James “Rhodey” Rhodes/Tony Stark, Tony Stark & Avengers Team, Tony Stark & Sam Wilson, James “Bucky” Barnes & Tony Stark, Tony Stark & His Bots - Relationship

read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NvOKNA

reblog.comment:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NvOKNA

by zade

He codes. He fiddles with Extremis more than he should, like he told Pepper and Rhodey he wouldn’t. He wants to make things better, make them right. He wants to be happy again, somehow. They agreed he would take time off from business, though, give him and Pepper time to heal into whatever they’re going to be next. This is their cocoon stage; they might make it into a butterfly.

He realizes fiddling with how his brain can interact with information while he’s upset is maybe not the smartest thing, but he’s pretty sure a straight brain-wifi connection is still smarter than drinking himself into temporary amnesia. He’s a genius, after all, even if his self-preservation instincts wouldn’t be out of place on a lemming.
–
Tony uses extremis to try and make himself better. That is not what happens, at all.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Life's Greatest Blessing
title: Life's Greatest Blessing
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2prgdBs

by Jessica_Wild

“That’s our fertile myrtle,” Clint jokes, smile creeping onto his face as he scoops up Harley to make place for Strange, “we can keep trying to keep the two of them away from each other, but I’m convinced that at this stage if Steve breathes a certain way, Tony’ll be knocked up with like, quintuplets or something.”

In which a slightly younger Tony and not-so-fresh-out-the-ice Steve are grossly in love and keep popping out babies and the Team actually IS a family.

Alternatively,

Family
Life’s greatest blessing, a group that dreams, laughs, plays and loves together, those whom you can always count on, always present not only in the good times, the most precious gifts.

Words: 1647, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: A first time of sorts
title: A first time of sorts
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2O1IQ63

by S_Horne

We can reschedule. Yeah, that’s a great idea! Let’s do it next week. Or next year. Does five years sound good to you? It sounds good to me – I’ll pencil it in. Five years from now… maybe on a Tuesday?”

Steve laughed loudly and reached out to take Tony’s hand in his, squeezing it lightly. “This is happening, sweetheart. Now.”

“But I don’t wanna,” Tony whined petulantly and his bottom lip started to jut out in an impressive pout that probably wasn’t meant to be as cute as he made it. “I don’t make good first impressions. I make much better second ones – you remember, I’m better the second time, aren’t I?”

“To make a second impression you have to have made a first,” Steve explained gently, laughter colouring his tone.

Words: 1227, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 22 of Stony September AUs

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe, Awesome Sarah Rogers, Fluff, Meeting the Parents, Tony Stark Gets a Hug

summary: remember marvel's sad attempt at redeeming that bitch h*ward in im2? yea? well in a4 they will probably have even less time for...
body: remember marvel’s sad attempt at redeeming that bitch h*ward in im2? yea? well in a4 they will probably have even less time for it, so if their intention behind bringing back the actual shittiest character in mcu is to try and redeem him in 2 mins or less,, im calling bullshit right away, they can go ahead and shove that plotline up their Ass and show us another slow mo closeup of tony’s actual ass instead of wasting precious minutes on “redeeming” that fucking child abuser piece of Shit

summary: The silver's tears
title: The silver's tears
body:
After New York battle time to go home, but would this be possible? Thor panicks as loki fell unconscious more paler and colder than ever if this was even possible fears of losing his brother again. Thor is protictive and the team start to ask questions and the truth needs to be told

I O U

Clint didn’t know whether to knock first or just open the door, Thor said he is asleep so no need to knock right! He turned on the light to see him curling on the bed shaking from the cold “This…

Read more…
